title: Schema for definition of processor registers/fuses for Secure Provision Tool and SPSDK
description: Copyright NXP 2020-2025, Schema for definition of processor registers for Secure Provision Tool and SPSDK
title: Definition of the register bit-field.

id.title: Unique bit-field ID. It must be provided for all bit-fields except reserved bit-fields.

name.title: Bit-field name (to be displayed in UI). Name must be provided for all bit-fields except reserved bit-fields.

deprecated_names.title: Optional list of alternative/backward compatible names for the bitfield.

width.title: Width of the bit-field, in bits.

description.title: Description of the bit-field. Description must be provided for all bit-fields except reserved bit-fields.

access.title: Access to the bit-field: Read/Write; Read-Only or Write-Only. The bit-field access must be same or STRICTER then register. `none` means no read, no write - currently used for Reserved bitfields which are not readable (RT118x)

calculated.title: Method how the bit-field value is calculated.

values.title: List of supported bit-field values - for `enumeration` style of bit-field. Values, that are not listed, are considered as reserved. If no values, then bit-field is considered as `integer` style bit-field.

name.title: Name of the bit-field value. It is a short text, how the value is displayed in GUI.

deprecated_names.title: Optional list of alternative/backward compatible names for the bitfield value.
